thread.title: Sunny Leone is excited. And it's got everything to do with Justin Bieber - Hindustan Times
thread.title_full: Sunny Leone is excited. And it's got everything to do with Justin Bieber - Hindustan Times

title: Sunny Leone is excited. And it's got everything to do with Justin Bieber - Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Sunny Leone is excited. And it’s got everything to do with Justin Bieber 
Justin Bieber’s debut gig in Mumbai is in May. And reports suggest Sunny Leone might be performing with him. Not saying much, the Baby Doll star expressed her excitement at attending the concert. bollywood Updated: Mar 19, 2017 18:15 IST Indo-Asian News Service There were reports about Sunny joining the Sorry hitmaker’s debut concert in India as a performer. 
Sunny Leone says she wishes it was true that she would perform at Canadian pop star Justin Bieber’s debut gig in Mumbai in May, but for now, she is only excited about attending the gala night. 
There were reports about Sunny joining the Sorry hitmaker’s debut concert in India as a performer. 
Asked if it is true, Sunny said: “Damn, I wish it was true. I know they have a bunch of names but who will perform... I have no idea. I’m just excited I’m going! So excited!” Justin Bieber performs at 102.7 KIIS FM’s Wango Tango at StubHub Center on May 9, 2015 in Los Angeles. (File Photo) 
For now, Sonakshi Sinha is confirmed as one of the celebrity performers at Bieber’s Purpose Tour gig in India. The concert will be held in May. 
On the acting front, Sunny is currently busy with her upcoming film Tera Intezaar, starring Arbaaz Khan. Tera Intezaar will reportedly be shot in Kutch as well as in international locations. Read more
